EmailTemplate.description: Email to thank those who are unable to attend.
EmailTemplate.name: NY - Networking - May 17 2012.Registered- Thank you (Regrets)
EmailTemplate.subject: We Are Sorry You Cannot Attend!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Spring 2012 Networking Reception: Zengo May 17, 2012 We are sorry that you are unable to attend the New York Metropolitan Area Spring Networking Event hosted by MBO Partners! We hope you can join us at the next event- stay tuned for details. Sincerely,
MBO Partners
MBO Partners Suggested dress code is business to business casual. Don't forget to bring your business cards! Questions? Please contact Marcelle Saab, Associate Relations Manager, 703-793-6006 MBO Partners 13454 Sunrise Valley Drive Suite 300 Herndon, VA 20171
Contact Us <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
